name: "Yellow flowers on Green Grass"
description: Phu Yen is one of the coastal provinces in South Central Viet Nam. This province has the breathtaking scenery with more than 200 km of shoreline and clean ocean water. Phu Yen Province also encompasses a diverse landscape of mountains, rivers, lagoons. But Phu Yen has no place in Vietnam tourism map. Recently, Phu Yen's becoming well-known thanks to the "Yellow flowers on green grass" movie phenomenon.
